rooms.description: Open, welcoming space with a reception desk and Vastu-compliant placement.
Large living area with Bohemian decor, accentuating natural light. Large windows and sliding doors ensure ventilation and adherence to Vastu principles.
Cozy dining area adjoining the living room; design incorporates open seating with a Bohemian flair.
Spacious kitchen with modern appliances, ensuring proper ventilation and fire escape route in accordance with building norms.
Multi-functional room designed for work and study; natural lighting is prioritized with south-facing window placement per Vastu guidelines.

Large windows to ensure adequate ventilation and natural lighting; placed in accordance with Vastu guidelines.
Door leading directly to the expansive garden area, designed for a seamless transition between indoor and outdoor spaces.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom; designed for relaxation and quiet, following Vastu guidelines with a south-west orientation.
Secondary bedroom optimized for privacy and comfort; features ample natural light with east-facing windows.
Children's room, designed to be vibrant and safe, ensuring optimal Vastu alignment for health and growth.
Dedicated private gym area with ample ventilation; incorporates soundproofing for minimal disturbance to adjoining rooms.
Modern home theater setup designed for immersive entertainment, with acoustics optimized and Vastu-compliant placement to promote harmony.

openings.description: Sturdy staircase connecting ground and upper floors, designed with safety features and Vastu alignment.
Balcony providing a private outdoor space with views of the garden; enhances natural light and fresh air.
